about_the_game:
Welcome to Formula Circus: The Pinnacle of Racing Simcade!

Embark on an unparalleled journey in the world of high-speed racing with Formula Circus, an innovative simcade that blends intense racing action with deep career management mechanics, crafted for both newcomers and seasoned racing aficionados. Set in the compelling universe of Formula A, where your decisions impact your career trajectory in profound ways, Formula Circus is not just a game—it’s your gateway to living out your motorsport dreams.

Key Features:


  • Intricately Crafted Career Mode: Forge your path in a dynamic career mode that mirrors the complexities of the racing world. Begin as a test driver, earn your place on a team, or jump straight into the action of professional racing. Each decision influences your career, from interactions with team members to strategic choices during races.

  • Advanced Damage Model: Experience a realistic damage system where accidents affect your car’s performance and race dynamics. Detailed animations show parts breaking off and affecting the race, including potential safety car deployments and in-race repairs.

  • Expansive Customization and Modding: Tailor your experience with unprecedented modding capabilities. The built-in track editor lets you create and share custom tracks, while extensive mod support allows for deep customization of cars, teams, and even game rules.

  • Robust Team Management Features: Take control in the 'Create a Team' mode, handling detailed aspects of team operation. Manage personnel, develop your car’s parts, negotiate with sponsors, and engage with the media to build your racing legacy.

  • Living Paddock Environment: The paddock is your arena for strategy and influence. Between races, interact with drivers, team bosses, engineers, and sponsors. Your ability to manage these relationships can make or break your career.

  • Evolving Game World: Watch the world of Formula Circus evolve with technology advancements, team changes, and new racing seasons. Your performance can lead to rule changes and new challenges, making no two careers the same.

Deep Dive into Game Mechanics:


  • Realistic Contract Negotiations: Immerse yourself in the most realistic contract negotiations seen in racing games. Your reputation, decisions, and relationships directly influence your contract terms, team dynamics, and even promotional opportunities.

  • Dynamic AI Relationships: AI drivers and team members remember your actions. Build alliances, create rivalries, and navigate the politics of the racing world. Drivers’ behaviors on the track reflect their real-life counterparts, adding a layer of strategy to each race.

  • Interactive Career Influence: Your actions off the track are as crucial as your performance on it. Engage in activities ranging from media interactions to sponsor events, influencing your public image and sponsorship opportunities.

  • Year-by-Year Evolution: Start your career in any historical era of Formula A and experience the authentic evolution of car technology and racing regulations. Each era offers unique challenges and opportunities to adapt your strategy.

Join Us on the Journey:


As we continue to develop Formula Circus, we are eager to involve the community in shaping the game. This Steam page is just the beginning. Here, you can follow our progress, participate in community discussions, and provide feedback that will influence the final game.

Shape the Future Together


In Formula Circus, our community is the driving force behind the evolution of the game. We believe in building a racing experience that resonates with and is shaped by our players. Here’s how you can get involved:

  • Feedback-Driven Development: Your insights matter. Regular polls and feedback sessions give you a voice in the game's ongoing development, ensuring that your input helps shape gameplay, features, and future content.

  • Modding Support: Dive deep into the game's architecture with extensive modding tools. Customize drivers, teams, and tracks, and share your creations with the world. Whether it's tweaking the aesthetics or overhauling the gameplay, your mods keep the race exciting for everyone.

  • Community Challenges: Participate in community-driven challenges and events that test your skill and creativity. Stand a chance to see your ideas implemented into the game and earn exclusive rewards.

  • Open Development Process: Stay in the loop with transparent development updates. We share what we’re working on, challenges we face, and celebrate our milestones directly with you through regular blog posts and developer streams.


By joining the Formula Circus community, you're not just playing a game; you're helping to create the ultimate racing experience. Wishlist now and be part of the journey from the starting line to the finish line!

We are committed to creating a game that resonates with our players and stands the test of time. Your feedback is crucial as we refine gameplay, add new features, and expand the world of Formula Circus. Participate in surveys, join beta tests, and tell us what you love and what you want to see improved.

Coming Soon:


Formula Circus is currently under development, and we're excited to share our progress with you. Stay tuned for exclusive sneak peeks, developer diaries, and early access information. Your early support and input will help us craft a racing experience that’s truly one of a kind.

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM

  • Storage: 30 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit, Windows 11 64-Bit
  • Processor: 8 core or more CPU

  • Storage: 80 GB available space
